name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Split Screen Pro - Browser Tab Split-Screen Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In the same browser window, display multiple tabs in split-screen mode with one click, and freely adjust the proportions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why Choose Split Screen Pro?

In our daily work and study, we often need to view multiple web pages simultaneously: comparing documents, referencing materials, translating content, coding... Constantly switching between tabs is not only time-consuming but also breaks your concentration. Split Screen Pro is designed to solve this exact problem!

ğŸš€ Core Benefits

One-Click Split Screen: Split your browser window instantly without complex operations
Flexible Layout: Freely adjust screen proportions to suit different content types
Seamless Switching: Say goodbye to frequent tab switching
User-Friendly: Intuitive interface with zero learning curve

ğŸ’¡ Perfect for Multiple Scenarios

Study & Research
Compare reference materials
Translation work
Note-taking
Research paper writing
Development & Programming
Code with documentation side by side
API reference
Testing and debugging
Code review
Content Creation
Research and writing
Content comparison
Multi-source information gathering
Real-time editing
Office Work
Data analysis
Email management
Document proofreading
Report compilation

â­ Why Install?

Boost Productivity: Reduce tab switching time by 70%
Enhanced Focus: Minimize distractions with organized workspace
Better Experience: No more dragging windows or manual arrangement
Zero Learning: Install and use immediately with intuitive controls
Whether you're a student, programmer, writer, or office professional, Split Screen Pro makes your browsing experience smoother and more efficient. Install now and experience a new way of multitasking!

ğŸ› ï¸ Key Features

Instant split-screen activation
Customizable screen proportions
Clean, modern interface
Memory-efficient performance
Regular updates and support
ğŸ’ª Technical Advantages
Lightweight extension (minimal system resources)
Fast and responsive
Secure operation
Compatible with all websites
No external dependencies

Install Split Screen Pro today and transform your browsing experience into a more productive and organized workflow!
